title: BloodConnect
subtitle: BloodConnect: Donate & Request Blood
description: A life-saving platform that connects blood donors with recipients in real-time, enabling fast, location-based blood requests and community support.
features: Post and respond to urgent blood donation requests
Real-time donor-recipient location tracking and notifications
Blood type filters, user verification, and donor history log

title: Health Monitor
subtitle: Vitals Tracking App
description: Monitors heart rate, blood pressure, and oxygen levels using wearable sensors and syncs to cloud.
